pullrequest.title: Added exits on errors to prevent false-success docker builds

content.raw:
Thanks for the contribution!

I think the `gzweb_2.0.0` branch is still in experimental mode at the moment, the latest recommended release branch is `gzweb_1.3.0` and there is active development going on `default`. Feel free to make pull requests to those branches too if you wish and I can merge them.

Cheers
content.html:
Thanks for the contribution!

I think the gzweb_2.0.0 branch is still in experimental mode at the moment, the latest recommended release branch is gzweb_1.3.0 and there is active development going on default. Feel free to make pull requests to those branches too if you wish and I can merge them.

Cheers
